name: Spearrow
description: The year is 2900, the human race is at war with the animal kingdom because the animals are tired of being captured and put in our local zoos. You are a robot built by apple to destroy any hostile animals. You are assigned to seal team 8 and are tasked to kill the mushroom king who is the central mind of the animal kingdom. Spearrow is a first person arcade shooter putting you into the experience of ultimate retaliation of your enemy.
